title: Change the 'No' option label to 'think about it'

requirements.text: Update the Valentine question UI so the second option label currently displayed as "No" is changed to exactly "think about it" (keep the "Yes!" option unchanged). This includes the moving/avoiding button component used for the second option.

quotes:
There are two options yes & No
Change no to think about it
Do the change and share it again

acceptanceCriteria: On the main question screen ("Will you be my Valentine?"), the second option button shows the text "think about it" instead of "No".
No other user-facing copy is unintentionally changed.

requirements.text: Rebuild and redeploy the updated frontend so the user can view/share the updated live version.

quotes: Do the change and share it again

acceptanceCriteria: A new deployed version is produced that includes the updated "think about it" label.
The deployed version loads without runtime errors and the main question screen renders correctly.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components are read-only in this environment).
Keep the backend as-is; no backend changes are required for this UI-only text update.
nonGoals: Changing the Valentine message text, the "Yes!" flow, or the confirmation screen content.
Adding new features (analytics, accounts, additional pages, etc.).
